body_html: Ooooooh, that is absolutely right! When we destroy the season, we lose all references to it. So maybe just deleting it isn't the best idea after all. I think to preserve the teams, projects, (…) for a given (ie. current) season, we really should update the current season like in the fake_*_phase methods.
body_text: Ooooooh, that is absolutely right! When we destroy the season, we lose all references to it. So maybe just deleting it isn't the best idea after all. I think to preserve the teams, projects, (…) for a given (ie. current) season, we really should update the current season like in the fake_*_phase methods.
body: Ooooooh, that is absolutely right! When we destroy the season, we lose all references to it. So maybe just deleting it isn't the best idea after all. I think to preserve the teams, projects, (…) for a given (ie. current) season, we really should update the current season like in the `fake_*_phase` methods.
